text: Vasyok Trubachyov and His Comrades () is a 1955 Soviet adventure movie directed by Ilya Frez.Ее убило горе. Трагическая судьба звезды фильма «Офицеры» Натальи РычаговойВасек Трубачев и его товарищи It stars Oleg Vishnev, Aleksandr Chudakov, and Vladimir Semenovich. == Actors == * Oleg Vishnev as Vasyok Trubachyov * Aleksandr Chudakov as Kolya Odintsov * Vladimir Semenovich as Sasha Bulgakov * Vyacheslav Devkin as Mazin * Georgi Aleksandrov as Rusakov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1955 adventure movies Category:Soviet adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Ilya Frez
title: Vasyok Trubachyov and His Comrades
